name: Blocks and Rows
description:
Blocks and Rows -- it is puzzle uncommon game.

The great powers of the tetris world have broken!

Swipe to move pieces around the board. When the pieces are assembled in a line, they are destroyed and points are awarded. The thicker the line, the more points! Don't let the board overflow and get the maximum number of points!

If field is RUNNING OUT OF SPACE you will lose!

Can you become the savior of the Tetris world?!

How to play?

  • Use WASD to swipe figures
  • Use mause to drag-n-drop manual figure 
  • Swipe the pieces and collect them in one line to clear the field
  • Collect several lines at a time to earn even more points
  • Partially destroyed pieces break up into small cubes
  • Use bombs to clear the field
  • Use the score multiplier to get MORE point per lines

Our game roadmap

  1. Jam release
  2. Add new themes
  3. Mobile Android and iOs release
  4. Add new game mode: Chalange levels
  5. Add new themes and every day and every week Chalanges

This game was developed for EpicMegaJam2021.

Play our game and share with your friends. 

Leave comments with your max score!

Game designed for mobiles (swipes, drag-n-drops, taps), so please play android version of game to have more fun.
